0: By: ctvbc.ca NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR A cute YouTube video of a cat sniffing and cuddling up to a newborn fawn quickly turns frightening when a protective mother deer begins trampling a dog nearby in a Cranbrook, B.C., neighbourhood. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Racking up nearly one and a half million views in three weeks, the video serves as a shocking reminder to stay away from wild baby animals. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR A dog apparently got a little too close to the deer's fawn and she attacked it. A horrified neighbour can be heard in the background screaming and yelling for the deer to stop.
